tool_description: This API allows users to quickly rewrite texts by generating multiple versions. It also supports the generation of spintax for different texts.

api_list.name: text_to_spintax
api_list.description: This endpoint takes a text input and returns it in spintax format, which can be used for content spinning.

optional_parameters.name: text_to_spintax
optional_parameters.description: The text that will be converted to spintax format.
optional_parameters.default: A physical activity capable of working in a complementary way with issues related to stress, anxiety, in addition to collaborating in the treatment of depression and insomnia.

api_list.name: text_to_rewrite
api_list.description: This endpoint takes a text input and returns a rewritten version of the text.

optional_parameters.name: text_to_rewrite
optional_parameters.description: The text that will be rewritten.
optional_parameters.default: A physical activity capable of working in a complementary way with issues related to stress, anxiety, in addition to collaborating in the treatment of depression and insomnia.
